channel.title: Edit suorce
channel.description:
I need help with edit my source
When i open Client file
and edit something and save it
it dont work
i try to edit welcome to reapagescape
but when i save it dont work :confused: :confused:

item.title: Edit suorce
item.dc:creator: @bobmich bobmich
item.description:
@bobmich wrote:

[quote=“ash dude34, post:4, topic:227736”]you need to compile then restart then run if it comes up with somthink like path not specified go on compile click edit and change it to

code

[quote author=pkf0rl1f3 link=topic=299306.msg2403424#msg2403424 date=1219580770]
@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit
[/quote][/quote]
yoou dont do that[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 24, 2008, 06:42:00 am[/size][hr]you go to compile.bat then type in com to update

Read full topic

item.title: Edit suorce
item.dc:creator: @ash_dude34 ash dude34
item.description:
@ash_dude34 wrote:

you need to compile then restart then run if it comes up with somthink like path not specified go on compile click edit and change it to

code

[quote=“pkf0rl1f3, post:2, topic:227736”]@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit[/quote]

Read full topic
